short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays clean porcha. Generates porcha in PDF. Downloadable and printable porcha in PDF to your PC or Laptop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension generates land document in PDF on click of the icon. This can be done only after generating the land document from the website https://jami.tripura.gov.in/Citizen_Service/citiz_ror.aspx. 
Once you have this extension on your chrome browser go to the site  https://jami.tripura.gov.in/Citizen_Service/citiz_ror.aspx and select all options from the drop down and type required data in the text field then press search button to display the land document below.
Now click the "Porcha Generator in PDF" icon with yellow background and green Tripura map. It should generate your land document in PDF which can be saved or printed.

Terms and Condition: The land document you are viewing in PDF may vary from the original land document with the Tripura government. Downloading the land document and viewing land document using chrome extension "Porcha Generator in PDF" is at your own responsibility. I will not be responsible for any change in document or violation of document or any temper of the same. You will solely responsible for any use and miss use of the land document generated by this extension.

Disclaimer: I do not own https://jami.tripura.gov.in/Citizen_Service/citiz_ror.aspx. https://jami.tripura.gov.in/Citizen_Service/citiz_ror.aspx is owned by  Tripura government and provided by National Informatics Centre, Tripura, India.
